Newark.One Riverview (Newark):
One Riverview is a building under construction in Newark, New Jersey, the first market rate residential high-rise to be newly built in the city since 1962.


== Location ==
One Riverview is adjacent to the New Jersey Performing Arts Center (NJPAC) and adjacent to the center's education facility at 24 Rector Street in Downtown Newark. It is nearby McCarter Highway across from which is the Passaic River.
